notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected potential damaged structures in Portoviejo city in Manabi Province, Ecuador. Located at approximately 170 km south of the 16 April 2016 Muisne earthquake mainshock epicenter and using Pleiades and Deimos-2 satellite images acquired the 19 April 2016 and a WorldView-2 image acquired the 26 July 2014, UNITAR - UNOSAT created a damage site density index for affected areas in the city of Portoviejo. City analyses revealed a total of 437 potentially damaged structures of which 87 are destroyed, 83 severely damaged, and 267 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
